value:
I am finally able to appreciate the
radiance of this world fully.

Each day with the Order of Heroes is
filled with delightful surprises. The
time seems to pass so quickly...

Your duties must be exhausting.
If there is anything I can do to
help, please say the word.

I trust in Líf. I suppose it is because,
in the realm of the dead... Well, in
short, he understands my past.

Ymir's power has filled me with new
warmth and life.

I am Eir, blessed with renewed life.
To see me so was the wish of your
friend $Nf.
This body is full of life.
I am pleased with my progress.
Life is not without its challenges...

Thank you. I will strive to become
worthy of the faith you have
placed in me.

I am Eir, blessed now with the power
of Ymir, the dragon of life.

Ymir told me what my life was like
when I was very young. I still find it
difficult to believe.$k$pI do have some early memories of my
mother, however. Those can never
be wiped away.$k$pEven if much of what has happened
in the time since has been painful...$k$pYmir says that all will be well.
That we can make new happy
memories together.$k$pWhat do you think? Do you feel the
same way, $Nu?$k$pAh. Yes, that is true.$k$pOne day I will restore the realm of life
to its former glory. I hope, when that
day arrives, you will come to visit.
What is to come?
There is too much at stake.
This is my power.
Ought I be the one?
I have failed...
I am Eir. I have been...changed. It is as yet beyond me…
You are always up to mischief...
All I know of my true home, I learned from Ymir.
I cannot say that life in the realm of the dead was pleasant. But, even so…
My mother in Hel and my true mother… They both have a place in my heart.
Someday... If only I could return to the realm of life...
Being near you fills me with the courage I need to go on living.
As you say.
I am torn...
Alone no longer.
